meaningMnemonic: You take some <radical>bamboo</radical> and <radical>attach</radical> it together into a <kanji>token</kanji> of appreciation for your friend. Your friend greatly appreciates this token of friendship.
readingMnemonic: You hand over the <kanji>token</kanji> but your friend drops it and yells, "You <reading>foo</reading>l (ふ)! I'm allergic to bamboo!"
